headline: Omnicom Group Inc. Provides Investors with More Time to Swap The Interpublic Group of Companies, Inc. (IPG) Notes
summary: With significant upside potential, The Interpublic Group of Companies, Inc. (NYSE:IPG) secures a spot on our list of the 11 Best Retirement Stocks to Buy According to Analysts.
